title: Maswick Cafeteria
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Buffet, Salad bar, Take-out, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Located 1/4 mile from the rim of the Canyon at Maswick Lodge. Large interior with 5 food stations, seats 400. Has a veggie burger (patty is vegan), chili (vegan), taco salad, many entrees; will accommodate requests, so be sure to let them know if you are vegan. Also offers hiker lunches to-go.
